name: See & Wait
description:
A short puzzle game that is not only about where to move, but also when to move. Who knows, this game might test your patience.

This game was made for Game Jam Easy Mode #1. There are 3 themes. This game belongs to theme : Time is a construct. 

To me, time is not a construct because the pain you feel when you wait is real.

Controls :

  • Move : W, A, S, D or Arrow Keys
  • Restart Level : R
